title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set, but expression builder still shows old column names when selecting the dataset.
SR: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set, but expression builder still shows old column names when selecting the dataset. Description: Set an alias for columns in a data set, but when selecting the data set in the expression builder, the old column names are still displayed. Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new data source and a data set. 2. Set an alias for the first column in the data set as 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the data set. 4.
